description.english: You opened your door, not sure where to put the first thing
description.schinese: 你推开属于自己的门，还没想好第一件东西该放哪
description.japanese: 自分のドアを開けたけれど、最初のアイテムをどこに置くか、まだ決められないみたい
description.tchinese: 你推開屬於自己的門，還沒想好第一件東西該放哪

description.english: You teamed up with a pup for your first job
description.schinese: 你的第一份工作，居然和小狗搭档
description.japanese: 初めての仕事で、まさか小さな犬とペアになるとは
description.tchinese: 你的第一份工作，居然和小狗搭檔

description.english: You served cake, but avoided the bedroom’s memories
description.schinese: 你端出一块蛋糕，不愿提起卧室里还有他的痕迹
description.japanese: ケーキを差し出したけど、寝室にまだ彼の痕跡が残っていることには、触れたくない
description.tchinese: 你端出一塊蛋糕，不願提起臥室裡還有他的痕跡

description.english: You got lost in ancient herbs and took a lonely path
description.schinese: 你沉迷于古老的草药，走上无人能及的道路
description.japanese: 古い薬草に夢中になり、誰も追いつけない道を歩み始める
description.tchinese: 你沉迷於古老的草藥，走上無人能及的道路

description.english: You stepped into the unknown, luckily the client knew better
description.schinese: 你踏入了完全未知的领域，还好客户比你更懂行
description.japanese: 完全に未知の世界に足を踏み入れたが、幸いに客のほうが詳しかった
description.tchinese: 你踏入了完全未知的領域，還好客戶比你更懂行

description.english: You are finally free to design the room you want
description.schinese: 你终于自由，能随心所欲设计理想的房间
description.japanese: ついに自由になり、理想の部屋を思うままにデザインできるようになった
description.tchinese: 你終於自由，能隨心所欲設計理想的房間

description.english: You saw cats everywhere you went
description.schinese: 你走到哪都能看见猫
description.japanese: どこへ行っても、猫の姿が見える
description.tchinese: 你走到哪都能看見貓

description.english: You bravely cleared the water plants in the cabin
description.schinese: 你勇敢地把小屋里的水草全收拾了
description.japanese: 小屋の水草を、勇気を出してすべて片付けた
description.tchinese: 你勇敢地把小屋裡的水草全收拾了

description.english: You gave them a little more warm time
description.schinese: 你让他们得到了更多温暖时光
description.japanese: 彼らに、より多くの温かい時間を届けた
description.tchinese: 你讓他們得到了更多溫暖時光

description.english: You rescued a teacup out of the paper sea—no time to sip
description.schinese: 你捞出了文件海中的茶杯，显然没空喝
description.japanese: 書類の海からティーカップを救い出したが、どうやら飲む時間はなさそうだ
description.tchinese: 你撈出了文件海中的茶杯，顯然沒空喝

description.english: You placed the last flowerpot, and fragrance spilled from your hands
description.schinese: 你放下最后一个花盆，芬芳从指缝间溢出
description.japanese: 最後の鉢を置くと、指の間から香りが溢れ出した
description.tchinese: 你放下最後一個花盆，芬芳從指縫間溢出

description.english: You said goodbye to one who wrote kindness with harsh words
description.schinese: 你送别了一位用苛严写善书的人
description.japanese: 厳しさ以て善行を書き記す人を見送った
description.tchinese: 你送別了一位用苛嚴寫善書的人

description.english: You stayed in the graveyard, spirits around you, no longer alone
description.schinese: 你停驻在墓地，幽影缠绕，你不再孤单
description.japanese: 墓地に立ち止まり、幽霊の影に包まれ、もう孤独ではない
description.tchinese: 你停駐在墓地，幽影纏繞，你不再孤單

description.english: You stayed up all night gaming with your bestie
description.schinese: 你约上闺蜜通宵打游戏
description.japanese: 親友を誘って、夜通しゲームをした
description.tchinese: 你約上閨蜜通宵打遊戲

description.english: You found the summer of your childhood
description.schinese: 你找到了小时候的夏天
description.japanese: 子供の頃の夏を見つけた
description.tchinese: 你找到了小時候的夏天

description.english: You let customers see exactly what they wanted
description.schinese: 你让上帝们一眼看到了自己想要的东西
description.japanese: 神様たちに、欲しいものを一目で見せた
description.tchinese: 你讓上帝們一眼看到了自己想要的東西

description.english: You copyed the shop multiply across town
description.schinese: 你让商店在小镇复制生长
description.japanese: 商店を町中に次々とオーブンさせた
description.tchinese: 你讓商店在小鎮複製生長

description.english: You whispered secrets to a friend under dim lights
description.schinese: 你在暧昧的灯光下向好友吐露秘密
description.japanese: 曖昧な灯りの下、親友に秘密を打ち明けた
description.tchinese: 你在曖昧的燈光下向好友吐露秘密

description.english: You successfully grew plants, but none are edible
description.schinese: 你成功种出了植物，可惜不能吃
description.japanese: 植物を見事に育てたが、残念ながら食べられないけど
description.tchinese: 你成功種出了植物，可惜不能吃

description.english: You crafted your first item with alchemy—100% original
description.schinese: 你使用炼金术合成了第一个物品，百分百原创
description.japanese: 錬金術で初めてのアイテムを合成した、完全オリジナルだ
description.tchinese: 你使用煉金術合成了第一個物品，百分百原創

description.english: You proved that water is endless
description.schinese: 你用行动证明，水资源是无限的
description.japanese: 行動で、水資源は無限だと証明した
description.tchinese: 你用行動證明，水資源是無限的

description.english: You owned another home with even more space
description.schinese: 你拥有了另一个属于自己的家，空间更大
description.japanese: もう一つ、自分だけの家を手に入れた、より広い空間だ
description.tchinese: 你擁有了另一個屬於自己的家，空間更大

description.english: You fixed that wall, and a ghost’s heart lit up
description.schinese: 你把那面墙拼好，幽灵的心也随之亮起一小盏灯
description.japanese: 壁を組み上げると、幽霊の心にもぽっと灯りがともった
description.tchinese: 你把那面牆拼好，幽靈的心也隨之亮起一小盞燈

description.english: You opened the oven, and butter filled the room
description.schinese: 你拉开烤炉，房间里多了一点黄油香气
description.japanese: オーブンを開けると、部屋にほんのりバターの香りが広がった
description.tchinese: 你拉開烤爐，房間裡多了一點黃油香氣

description.english: You snagged a smart egg from another world
description.schinese: 你搞到了异世界的聪明蛋
description.japanese: 異世界の賢い卵を手に入れた
description.tchinese: 你搞到了異世界的聰明蛋

description.english: You found a place to rest
description.schinese: 你找到了一个歇脚的地方
description.japanese: ひと休みできる場所を見つけた
description.tchinese: 你找到了一個歇腳的地方

description.english: You opened the haunted house, and her prank was finally answered
description.schinese: 你推开鬼屋的门，她的恶作剧终于有人回应
description.japanese: お化け屋敷のドアを押すと、彼女の悪戯がようやく応えられた
description.tchinese: 你推開鬼屋的門，她的惡作劇終於有人回應

displayName.japanese: 古いページに新しい跡

description.english: You dug up your old doodle book and drew new lines
description.schinese: 你翻出儿时的涂鸦本，在空白处留下了新的线条
description.japanese: 子供の頃の落書き帳をめくり、空白に新たな線を描き加えた
description.tchinese: 你翻出兒時的塗鴉本，在空白處留下了新的線條

description.english: You skipped the card game and turned mahjong into something new
description.schinese: 你没组牌局，而是让麻将变成了另一种游戏
description.japanese: 麻雀を組まず、別のゲームに変えてみせた
description.tchinese: 你沒組牌局，而是讓麻將變成了另一種遊戲

description.english: You grew stranger flowers, each with impossible shapes
description.schinese: 你种出了更多植物，每一朵花都有不可思议的形态
description.japanese: さらに多くの植物を育て、どの花も不思議な形をしていた
description.tchinese: 你種出了更多植物，每一朵花都有不可思議的形態

description.english: You closed the window—Grandma didn’t want to share GD Boys videos with the cat
description.schinese: 你关上了窗，老奶奶不想和猫分享少年团的视频
description.japanese: 窓を閉める、おばあちゃんは少年団の動画を猫とシェアしたくなかった
description.tchinese: 你關上了窗，老奶奶不想和貓分享少年團的影片

description.english: You remembered the imaginary friends from your childhood
description.schinese: 你记起来了童年回忆里的幻想伙伴
description.japanese: 子供の頃に思い描いた幻想の友達を思い出した
description.tchinese: 你記起來了童年回憶裡的幻想夥伴

description.english: You touched the higher dimension, and he came through… to cook
description.schinese: 你触及高维世界，他穿越时空而来……说要做饭
description.japanese: 高次元の世界に触れると、彼は時空を越えてやってきた……料理を作ると言って
description.tchinese: 你觸及高維世界，他穿越時空而來……說要做飯

description.english: You stepped through the mirror and broke into his lab
description.schinese: 你穿过那面镜子，闯入了他的实验室
description.japanese: その鏡をくぐり抜け、彼の実験室に侵入した
description.tchinese: 你穿過那面鏡子，闖入了他的實驗室

description.english: You finally fixed it and reached the Genesis Terminal
description.schinese: 你终于修好了它，进入了创世终端
description.japanese: ついにそれを修復し、創世ターミナルへと入った
description.tchinese: 你終於修好了它，進入了創世終端

description.english: You just got started, a little clumsy still
description.schinese: 你刚刚上路，还带着点手忙脚乱
description.japanese: 旅立ったばかりで、まだ少し慌てている
description.tchinese: 你剛剛上路，還帶著點手忙腳亂

description.english: You found order in the chaos
description.schinese: 你现在能在混乱之间找到条理
description.japanese: 今や混乱の中でも秩序を見出せる
description.tchinese: 你現在能在混亂之間找到條理

description.english: You caught the rhythm, and the room listened
description.schinese: 你渐渐掌握节奏，房间开始乖乖听话
description.japanese: 少しずつリズムを掴み、部屋がおとなしく従った
description.tchinese: 你漸漸掌握節奏，房間開始乖乖聽話

description.english: You turned every space into a stage for design
description.schinese: 你能将任何空间化作设计的舞台
description.japanese: どんな空間も、デザインのステージに変えられる
description.tchinese: 你能將任何空間化作設計的舞台

description.english: You made housekeeping into an art
description.schinese: 你的家政成为了一种艺术
description.japanese: 家事が、ひとつの芸術になった
description.tchinese: 你的家政成為了一種藝術

description.english: You squeezed the duck
description.schinese: 你捏了捏鸭子
description.japanese: アヒルちゃんをぎゅっと握った
description.tchinese: 你捏了捏鴨子

description.english: You spotted stubborn stains in her new home
description.schinese: 你在新家发现了顽固的污渍
description.japanese: 新しい家で、頑固な汚れを見つけた
description.tchinese: 你在新家發現了頑固的汙漬

description.english: You found a place no one had been before
description.schinese: 你找到了一个没人来过的地方
description.japanese: 誰も訪れたことのない場所を見つけた
description.tchinese: 你找到了一個沒人來過的地方

description.english: You used magic to make it snow
description.schinese: 你用魔法降下了一场雪
description.japanese: 魔法で、雪を降らせた
description.tchinese: 你用魔法降下了一場雪

description.english: You struck your first bass note
description.schinese: 你弹响了第一声低音
description.japanese: 最初の低音を奏でた
description.tchinese: 你彈響了第一聲低音

description.english: You tried to open the locked freezer
description.schinese: 你试图打开紧闭的冰柜
description.japanese: ぎっしり閉まった冷凍庫を開けようとした
description.tchinese: 你試圖打開緊閉的冰櫃

description.english: You found a cat in a towel
description.schinese: 你发现毛巾里长出了一只猫
description.japanese: タオルの中から、猫が一匹生えているのを発見した
description.tchinese: 你發現毛巾裡長出了一隻貓

description.english: You made sweet, chilly ice cream
description.schinese: 你制作了清凉又甜蜜的冰激凌
description.japanese: ひんやり甘いアイスクリームを作り上げた
description.tchinese: 你製作了清涼又甜蜜的冰淇淋

description.english: You made the skeleton sigh with comfort
description.schinese: 你让骷髅发出了舒适的呜呜声
description.japanese: ドクロが心地よい「ウー」という声を出した
description.tchinese: 你讓骷髏發出了舒適的嗚嗚聲

description.english: You discovered the secret of burnt bread
description.schinese: 你发现了烤焦面包的秘密
description.japanese: 焦げたパンの秘密を見つけた
description.tchinese: 你發現了烤焦麵包的秘密

description.english: You watched the tree dancing in the sun
description.schinese: 你看见那棵树在阳光里舞蹈
description.japanese: あの木が日差しの中で踊っているのを見た
description.tchinese: 你看見那棵樹在陽光裡舞蹈

description.english: You helped the broom find a new pose
description.schinese: 你让扫把找到了新的姿态
description.japanese: ほうきに新たな姿を見出させた
description.tchinese: 你讓掃把找到了新的姿態

description.english: You sparked a little party
description.schinese: 你点燃了一场小型派对
description.japanese: 小さなパーティーに火をつけた
description.tchinese: 你點燃了一場小型派對

description.english: You looked more shocked than him
description.schinese: 你看起来比他更惊讶
description.japanese: 彼より自分の方が驚いているように見える
description.tchinese: 你看起來比他更驚訝

description.english: You knew someone was holding on to the world
description.schinese: 你知道有人正努力维系着与世界的联系
description.japanese: 誰かが世界とのつながりを、必死に保とうとしていることを知った
description.tchinese: 你知道有人正努力維繫著與世界的聯繫

description.english: You couldn’t grasp the folding geometry
description.schinese: 你理解不了那几何展开又折叠
description.japanese: あの幾何学が展開しては折りたたまれる様子は理解できない
description.tchinese: 你理解不了那幾何展開又折疊

description.english: You opened an old time capsule
description.schinese: 你打开了旧日的时光胶囊
description.japanese: 過去のタイムカプセルを開けた
description.tchinese: 你打開了舊日的時光膠囊

displayName.japanese: シュレーディンガーの木

description.english: You found a tree both dead and alive
description.schinese: 你发现一棵又死又活的树
description.japanese: 死んでいるのか生きているのか分からない木を見つけた
description.tchinese: 你發現一棵又死又活的樹

description.english: You got on the bus and began a journey
description.schinese: 你登上公交车，开启一段未知旅程
description.japanese: バスに乗り込み、未知の旅を始めた
description.tchinese: 你登上公車，開啟一段未知旅程

description.english: You saw the lonely lamp still shining
description.schinese: 你看见那盏孤单的灯依旧亮着
description.japanese: あの孤独な灯りが、まだ光っているのを見た
description.tchinese: 你看見那盞孤單的燈依舊亮著

description.english: You uncovered a gravestone caught between being and not
description.schinese: 你发现了那块介于存在于不存在之间的墓碑
description.japanese: 存在とも非存在ともつかない墓碑を見つけた
description.tchinese: 你發現了那塊介於存在與不存在之間的墓碑

description.english: You wondered if time had looped
description.schinese: 你怀疑时间是否绕了个圈
description.japanese: 時間がぐるりと回ったのではないかと疑った
description.tchinese: 你懷疑時間是否繞了個圈

description.english: You spotted his secret note made from newspaper scraps
description.schinese: 你看到了他用报纸拼出的神秘留言
description.japanese: 彼が新聞紙で作った神秘メッセージを見た
description.tchinese: 你看到了他用報紙拼出的神秘留言

description.english: You lit incense and revealed hidden art
description.schinese: 你点上香，让画布显现出隐藏的图案
description.japanese: 線香を焚くと、キャンバスに隠された模様が浮かび上がった
description.tchinese: 你點上香，讓畫布顯現出隱藏的圖案

description.english: You held the brush and made a masterpiece in a stroke
description.schinese: 你握住笔，随手一挥便是一幅佳作
description.japanese: ペンを握り、さっと一振りで見事な作品が生まれた
description.tchinese: 你握住筆，隨手一揮便是一幅佳作

description.english: You restored someone’s colors
description.schinese: 你让一个人恢复了色彩
description.japanese: ある人に、色彩を取り戻させた。
description.tchinese: 你讓一個人恢復了色彩

description.english: You fixed the road
description.schinese: 你修好了路面
description.japanese: 道路を修復した
description.tchinese: 你修好了路面

description.english: You picked up a phone with no number
description.schinese: 你拿起了没有任何号码的电话
description.japanese: 何の番号も書かれていない電話を手に取った
description.tchinese: 你拿起了沒有任何號碼的電話

displayName.japanese: レインボーキャンディ

description.english: You walked through colorful rain
description.schinese: 你淋到了彩色的雨
description.japanese: カラフルな雨に濡れた
description.tchinese: 你淋到了彩色的雨

description.english: You received a heart from the well
description.schinese: 你收到了水井里递来的爱心
description.japanese: 井戸から届けられたハートを受け取った
description.tchinese: 你收到了水井裡遞來的愛心

description.english: You noticed something odd about the giraffe
description.schinese: 你注意到了长颈鹿的不同寻常
description.japanese: キリンのおかしいところに気づいた
description.tchinese: 你注意到了長頸鹿的不同尋常

description.english: You stand before the massive crane, fearless.
description.schinese: 你面对巨大的塔吊，毫不畏惧
description.japanese: 工事現場の小さなドアを見つけた
description.tchinese: 你找到了一個工地的小門

description.english: You finished the task for her
description.schinese: 你替她做完了那件事
description.japanese: 彼女の代わりに、あの小さな用事を済ませた
description.tchinese: 你替她做完了那件小事

description.english: You pried up the stubborn floorboard
description.schinese: 你把那块不肯松动的床板拆了下来
description.japanese: どうしても外れなかったベッド板を取り外した
description.tchinese: 你把那塊不肯鬆動的床板拆了下來

description.english: You grew a flower taller than all others
description.schinese: 你种出了一朵格外高大的花
description.japanese: ひときわ大きな花を育てた
description.tchinese: 你種出了一朵格外高大的花

description.english: You found the lamp from your childhood dream
description.schinese: 你找到了小时候梦里的那盏灯
description.japanese: 子供の頃、夢に出てきたあの灯りを見つけた
description.tchinese: 你找到了小時候夢裡的那盞燈

displayName.japanese: でたらめに塗りたくる

description.english: You scribbled wildly in the doodle book
description.schinese: 你在涂鸦本上乱涂乱画
description.japanese: 落書き帳に好き勝手に描きなぐった
description.tchinese: 你在塗鴉本上亂塗亂畫

description.english: You built a new shelf from old planks
description.schinese: 你用旧木板拼了一个新架子
description.japanese: 古い木板で新しい棚を組み立てた
description.tchinese: 你用舊木板拼了一個新架子

description.english: You swung the hammer and nailed the mole
description.schinese: 你挥下的锤子正好砸中了冒头的地鼠
description.japanese: 振り下ろしたハンマーが、顔を出したモグラにちょうど当たった
description.tchinese: 你揮下的錘子正好砸中了冒頭的地鼠

description.english: You spotted a basketball at 4 a.m.
description.schinese: 你看见了凌晨四点的篮球
description.japanese: 深夜4時のバスケットボールを見た
description.tchinese: 你看見了凌晨四點的籃球

description.english: You learned no one can resist a meow
description.schinese: 你发现没有人能抵抗喵喵
description.japanese: 誰も「ニャーニャー」に抗えないことと悟った
description.tchinese: 你發現沒有人能抵抗喵喵

description.english: You met a Taoist priest
description.schinese: 你遇见了一个道士
description.japanese: 道士に出会った
description.tchinese: 你遇見了一個道士

description.english: You discovered the first fridge that can be opened
description.schinese: 你发现了第一台能真正打开的冰箱
description.japanese: 初めて、本当に開けられる冷蔵庫を発見した
description.tchinese: 你發現了第一台能真正打開的冰箱

description.english: You saw the statue sneak a move
description.schinese: 你发现雕塑偷偷动了一下
description.japanese: 彫刻がこっそり動いたのを発見した
description.tchinese: 你發現雕塑偷偷動了一下

description.english: You spotted a dozing stone lion
description.schinese: 你发现了一尊打盹的石狮子
description.japanese: 居眠りしている石獅子を見つけた
description.tchinese: 你發現了一尊打盹的石獅子

description.english: You lit the lighthouse, and lost ships found their way
description.schinese: 你点亮了灯塔，迷途的船找到了方向
description.japanese: 灯台を灯すと、迷っていた船が進む方向を見出した
description.tchinese: 你點亮了燈塔，迷途的船找到了方向

description.english: You sent a ship to chase new stories
description.schinese: 你派了一艘船，出去寻找新的故事
description.japanese: 船を一隻送り、新たな物語を探しに出かけた
description.tchinese: 你派了一艘船，出去尋找新的故事

description.english: You found a really narrow alley
description.schinese: 你找到了一条真的很窄的巷子
description.japanese: 本当に狭い路地を見つけた
description.tchinese: 你找到了一條真的很窄的小巷

description.english: You fixed the fire hydrant on the way
description.schinese: 你顺手修好了消防栓
description.japanese: ついでに消火栓を直した
description.tchinese: 你順手修好了消防栓
